title: SLPerf: a Unified Framework for Benchmarking Split Learning. (arXiv:2304.01502v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Data privacy concerns has made centralized training of data, which is scattered across silos, infeasible, leading to the need for collaborative learning frameworks. To address that, two prominent frameworks emerged, i.e., federated learning (FL) and split learning (SL). While FL has established various benchmark frameworks and research libraries, SL currently lacks a unified library despite its diversity in terms of label sharing, model aggregation, and cut layer choice. This lack of standardization makes comparing SL paradigms difficult. To address this, we propose SLPerf, a unified research framework and open research library for SL, and conduct extensive experiments on four widely-used datasets under both IID and Non-IID data settings. translated_title: SLPerf：基准测试共享学习的统一框架
translated_abstract: 随着数据隐私问题的日益严重，分布式数据的中央化训练变得不可行，需要协作学习框架。为了解决这个问题，出现了两种主要的框架：联邦学习（FL）和分割学习（SL）。虽然FL已经建立了各种基准框架和研究库，但SL目前尚缺乏统一的库，尤其是在标签共享、模型聚合和切割层选择方面的多样性。这种标准化缺乏使得比较SL范式变得困难。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了SLPerf，这是一个统一的共享学习研究框架和开放式研究库，并在四个广泛使用的数据集上进行了大量实验，这些数据集涵盖了IID和非IID数据的情况。我们的贡献包括对最近提出的SL范式的全面调查，不同SL范式在不同情况下进行详细的基准比较，以及用于改进SL范式的丰富工程带走信息和研究见解。
tldr: SLPerf是一个统一的研究和开放式研究库，用于共享学习，通过对不同情况下不同共享学习范式的基准比较，提供了改进共享学习范式的见解。
en_tdlr: SLPerf is a unified research framework and open research library for split learning which offers insights for improving split learning paradigms through benchmarking different scenarios.
